sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; const DocumentForm = ({ doc, onSubmit, onCancel }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: doc?.title || '', description: doc?.description || '', type: doc?.type || '', category: doc?.category || '', version: doc?.version || '', status: doc?.status || '', author: doc?.author || '', tags: doc?.tags?.join(', ') || '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const updatedDoc = { ...doc, ...formData, tags: formData.tags.split(',').map((tag) => tag.trim()), }; onSubmit(updatedDoc); }; return (
